means: 何露斯（古代埃及的太阳神）

sentence.Network_en: Horus avenges his father Osiris by launching the First Pyramid War.
sentence.Network_cn: 8970年,荷露斯第一次发动金字塔战争,为他的父亲欧西里斯报仇.

sentence.Network_en: At that time, people prayed to Horus, the god of the Sun.
sentence.Network_cn: 那个时候, 人们向太阳之神——何露斯祈祷.

sentence.Network_en: Thoth, with his wisdom and special powers, healed the eye of Horus.
sentence.Network_cn: 透特凭借自己的智慧和魔力治愈了和鲁斯的眼疾.
